law.catch_line: Instead of or in addition to suspending or revoking a registration, the Commissioner may:...
law.text:
Instead of or in addition to suspending or revoking a registration, the Commissioner may:
impose on the holder a penalty not exceeding $125,000 for each violation of this subtitle; and
require the holder to make restitution to any person that has suffered financial injury because of the violation of this subtitle.
